title: Compare Funko’s (FNKO) reported Q1 2025 gross margin to gross margin guidance issued with Q4 2024 results. Report the outcome as “% BEAT” or “% MISS,”, rounded to two decimal places.
description:
1) Locate reported Q1 2025 gross margin: Funko’s May 8, 2025 press release states gross margin of 40.3% for Q1 2025.
 
 2) Locate gross margin guidance issued with Q4 2024 results: Funko’s March 6, 2025 press release (Q4 2024 results) guided 2025 first-quarter gross margin at approximately 39%.
 
 3) Compute beat/miss and report: 40.3% (reported) − 39.0% (guided) = 1.30 percentage points, rounded to two decimals → 1.30% BEAT.

rubric.criteria: Reported Q1 2025 gross margin = 40.3% (May 8, 2025 press release).
Guided Q1 2025 gross margin = approximately 39.0% (March 6, 2025 press release).
Computed difference between reported and guided gross margin = 1.30 percentage points (40.3% − 39.0%), rounded to two decimals.
